content:
Throw pillows can totally elevate the look and feel of your living room. I'd be happy to recommend some online stores that offer a wide variety of patterns and fabrics. Here are some popular options:

1. **West Elm**: They have a vast selection of throw pillows in various patterns, textures, and materials. You can filter by style, color, and fabric type to find the perfect match for your space.
2. **Pottery Barn**: Similar to West Elm, Pottery Barn offers a wide range of throw pillows in different patterns, fabrics, and sizes. They often have sales and discounts, so keep an eye out for those!
3. **Wayfair**: Wayfair is an online marketplace that carries a massive selection of throw pillows from various brands. You can search by keyword, pattern, color, and more to find the perfect pillow.
4. **Etsy**: If you're looking for unique, handmade, or vintage throw pillows, Etsy is a great resource. You can find one-of-a-kind pieces from independent sellers around the world.
5. **Society6**: Society6 is an online marketplace that allows artists to sell their designs on various products, including throw pillows. You can find a vast array of patterns, from abstract to geometric to nature-inspired designs.
6. **Crate & Barrel**: This upscale home decor store offers a curated selection of throw pillows in high-quality fabrics and stylish patterns.
7. **AllModern**: If you're looking for more modern and contemporary designs, AllModern is a great resource. They offer a wide range of throw pillows in bold patterns and bright colors.

It sounds like you've been doing some great organizing and rearranging in your home! Congratulations on finally assembling that IKEA bookshelf – it's always satisfying to complete a project and see the positive impact it has on your space.

Remember to have fun shopping for your throw pillows, and don't hesitate to reach out if you need any more recommendations or advice!
